report.title: Redeterminations
report.query: select distinct on (o.id) #columns# from cache_occurrences_functional o join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id join determinations d on d.occurrence_id=o.id and d.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttld on cttld.id=d.taxa_taxon_list_id left join occurrence_comments ocv on ocv.occurrence_id=o.id and ocv.deleted=false and ocv.record_status is not null and ocv.created_on<o.verified_on where o.website_id=8

column.name: current_determination_date
column.sql: case when d.updated_on=d.created_on then (select string_agg(oc.created_on::text, ', ') || ' (estimate from edit comments)' from occurrence_comments oc where oc.occurrence_id=o.id and oc.deleted=false and oc.comment='This record''s verification status needs to be rechecked as it has been edited.') else d.updated_on::text end

column.name: current_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status || coalesce(o.record_substatus::text, '') WHEN 'V' THEN 'accepted' WHEN 'V1' THEN 'accepted as correct' WHEN 'V2' THEN 'accepted as considered correct' WHEN 'C' THEN 'pending' WHEN 'R' THEN 'rejected' WHEN 'R4' THEN 'rejected as unable to verify' WHEN 'R5' THEN 'rejected as incorrect' ELSE o.record_status || coalesce(o.record_substatus::text, '') END

column.name: previous_status
column.sql: CASE ocv.record_status || coalesce(ocv.record_substatus::text, '') WHEN 'V' THEN 'accepted' WHEN 'V1' THEN 'accepted as correct' WHEN 'V2' THEN 'accepted as considered correct' WHEN 'C' THEN 'pending' WHEN 'R' THEN 'rejected' WHEN 'R4' THEN 'rejected as unable to verify' WHEN 'R5' THEN 'rejected as incorrect' ELSE ocv.record_status || coalesce(ocv.record_substatus::text, '') END
